defaultDescription: Relevant Builders brings a personal approach to home construction in the Chippewa Valley. We'll build a custom home to fit the needs of your family.

/process.title: Our Process
/process.description: Relevant Builders pours significant care into every project to ensure it's uniquely suited to fit your family's needs.

/construction.title: New Home Construction
/construction.description: With Relevenat Builders, you get decades of experience, superior craftsmanship, and attention to detail, to build you a home that will stand the test of time.

/construction/contracting.title: General Contracting
/construction/contracting.description: Need help putting all the pieces of your project together? Let Relevant Builders handle it for you.

/construction/design.title: Custom Home Design
/construction/design.description: Most people know what they want in a home, they just don't know how to translate that to a complete design. Let us help you with that.

/additions.title: Home Additions
/additions.description: Do you like where you live but need more space? However you'd like to add to your home's footprint, indoors our outdoors, Relevant Builders can make it happen.
